# Production

-   The Docker Model Runner (DMR) - A new Docker Desktop feature that enables the run of Large Language Models natively with Docker Desktop.
    -   Follows the common Docker workflow:
        -   Pull models from registries (e.g., Docker Hub)
        -   Run models locally with GPU acceleration
        -   Integrate models into the development workflows
